item.name: 1.3.13 Publish package

body.raw:
----------------------------127308995100818139707097
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="clientBuild"

false
----------------------------127308995100818139707097
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="config"

{
    "packageId": "QS-STATIC-TEST-1.PKG",
    "version": "1.0",
    "status": "draft",
    "versionFolder": "qwerty",
    "refs": [],
    "files": [{
            "fileId": "petstore.yaml",
            "publish": true
        }
    ]
}
----------------------------127308995100818139707097
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="sources"; filename="petstore_yml.zip"
Content-Type: application/zip;base64


----------------------------127308995100818139707097--
